reviews.review: beautiful avengers movie with all the superheroes introduced up to that point from the marvel universe united against the mad titan who wants to destroy half the universe
Brilliant! Love how everything comes together. Great job of blending all these characters while still allowing time to shine on their separate stories
This is clearly the best avenger film due to it's realistic and vulnerability of these characters, which other marvel movies seem to lack.
Great job balancing so many characters and interweaving plot lines.
One of the better MCU films. It's because it's all about thanos, a character that is actually interesting.

I don't know how a movie like this could possibly get an 80%+ score. Prior to and during the viewing of this film, I can't shake this feeling that this whole movie simply revolves around the Thanos snap. And everything has to fall in line no matter how irrational or illogical it may sound in retrospect. So for no apparent reason, bruce banner suddenly can't turn into hulk. And for no apparent reason, Doctor Strange suddenly forgot that he could just rewind time when Thanos has the upper hand.

I dunno. Maybe I didn't read the original comics or story because it's way before my time. Maybe all of it makes perfect sense in the original script. But it certainly didn't make any sense in the movie. All of it seems like all set in motion to create this clash between the heroes and the god-like Thanos. At the cost of sensibility. And stripped of the thrill of that final clash, since the movie is clearly building up to the snap, this movie is nothing but a lot of flares and grunting. Pardon my language, I think I could say the same for some pornography, but at least there'd be some action in it.

It is necessary for us in Western culture to develop the cultural language of defeat and hopelessness. This movie is a good start to this conversation. Unfortunately, it may just lead to another super hero movie with predictive positive ending and endless affirmations which circulates neoliberal ideas.
My favourite movie of all time
Badass entertainment with josh brolin as thanos what else could you want
